DisplayName.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Leon's Modded SMG

Description.value: Gather tons of pistols to help equip the settlement, then repair the degredaded weapon to ultimately obtain a premium named SMG.

Author.value: ShoudenKalferas, Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Modlet, 7DaystoDie.JP, PaLoALo, ArkAngel
